content.en: Advancements in DRL: Researchers have been investigating the improvements and challenges in reinforcement learning and deep learning. They have found that algorithms such as deep reinforcement learning (DRL) and convolutional networks have been key in these advancements. Additionally, there has been a focus on multi-agent deep reinforcement learning (MDRL) and its applications, as well as the development of open-source libraries like ChainerRL. These studies aim to understand the current state of deep reinforcement learning and its potential in various fields.
content.da: Fremskridt i DRL: Forskere har undersøgt forbedringer og udfordringer inden for forstærkningslæring og dyb læring. De har fundet, at algoritmer såsom dyb forstærkningslæring (DRL) og convolutional netværk har været nøglen til disse fremskridt. Derudover har der været fokus på multi-agent dyb forstærkningslæring (MDRL) og dets anvendelser samt udviklingen af open-source biblioteker som ChainerRL. Disse studier sigter mod at forstå den nuværende tilstand af dyb forstærkningslæring og dets potentiale inden for forskellige områder.
